HtmlAttribute.Name: "class"
HtmlAttribute.Value: "imx-icon "+ from EditTable select current ( if (EditColumn = 'Assigned') then "imx-icon-AssignedDirect" else if(EditColumn in ('New', 'OrderProduct', 'Waiting', 'OrderProlongate', 'OrderUnsubscribe')) then "imx-icon-Workflow" else if(EditColumn in ('Dismissed', 'Aborted')) then "imx-icon-Error" else if(EditColumn = 'Granted') then "imx-icon-BlueCheckmark" else if(EditColumn in ('Unsubscribed')) then "imx-icon-AssignedNone" else "" )
